https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Crackpot is a comedy about an eccentric homeless man and his motley crew of outcasts who challenge the powers that be in a series of zany misadventures. Bobby sleeps in alleys and drifts through life, until an old friend inspires him to rise up and rally a group of followers to break free from social constraints. Crackpot
